00059                 $dbms = new mysqli($host, $user, $pass);
00060 
00061                 if (mysqli_connect_errno() || ($dbms->select_db($db) === FALSE))
00062                         return false;
00063                 else
00064                 {
00065                         $dbms->close();
00066                         return true;
00067                 }
